About.paragraph: I'm an Full Stack developer with a B.S. degree in Technology Management from UC Davis. Having a solid foundation in data structures and algorithms, front end developement and agile software development has helped me to solve complex and challenging problems. As a developer, I always strive to learn new technologies to create efficient and elegant applications. Developing Apps is my passion, and I hope to positively impact people's lives. When I'm not coding, I enjoy working out, playing basketball, listening to music, and reading.

Projects.title: BeNatively
Projects.description: Next-Generation international ebook market place to buy or read
Projects.function: BeNatively helps readers to map ebooks between English and over 100 other languages and publishers to expand their audiences.
Projects.features: Email Authentication, Data Caching, Real Time Database
Projects.technologies: React, Javascript, Firebase Database, Google Cloud, NLP
